channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei -- ALP-AL00B
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei -- ALP-AL00B

item.title: CVE-2019-19412|2024-08-05T02:16:47.114Z -- huawei -- alp-al00b
item.description: Huawei smart phones have a Factory Reset Protection (FRP) bypass security vulnerability. When re-configuring the mobile phone using the factory reset protection (FRP) function, an attacker login the Talkback mode and can perform some operations to install a third-Party application. Affected products can be found in https://www.huawei.com/en/psirt/security-advisories/huawei-sa-20200115-01-frp-en.
